job description:
Prospect 33 has an exciting opportunity for a seasoned data professional to join a growing team on a full time basis in their lower Manhattan offices.

As a Senior Data Scientist in the Algorithmic Trading group, you will work on a green field application for client intelligence, operational resiliency and monitoring of all Electronic trading flow.

What will you do?
  • Facilitate the build out of an Analytics platform to capture Electronic trading flow (DMA and Algo).
  • Build solutions with kdb+, Q, R and HTML5
  • Work with Quants and Client services within multiple desks (Fixed Income, Equities and Futures) to understand their requirement and formulate solutions
  • Identify and implement solutions to optimize performance and maintain low latency
  • Promote and ensure compliance to the enterprise risk controls of the organization and external regulationsWhat do you need to succeed?
#LI-CF1
